attributes.action: Call a general election so the british can show you what we really think of you and your goverment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since Mr Brown arrived in power this country has gone downhill very fast. Inflation is at its highest in over 10 years, petrol prices are the highest we have ever seen. Now Mr Darling calls for our pay rises not to exceed inflation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
